data.scheme_name: Uttar Pradesh Warehousing and Logistics Policy 2022 - Logistics Park - Back end subsidies - Existing
data.benefits: Scheme provides Back-end subsidies of 25% of eligible capital investment upto maximum of Rs.2500 lakhs, 100% electricity duty exemption for 10 years for Logistics park project.
data.eligibility: All existing units who wants to setup Logistics Park project (Logistics facilities, Infrastructure facilities, Business & Commercial facilities) are eligible under this scheme.
data.conditions: Eligible Logistics Park project means those projects developed on atleast 25 acres of land in the State.EIP (Eligibility Investment Period) starts from the first investment date within the effective period and lasts up to 5 years or until commercial operations begin, whichever is earlier.Eligible Capital Investment refers to capital investment made during the eligible investment period. If investment starts before the effective date, at least 80% must be made after the effective date for it to be considered eligible for incentives.Reimbursements are provided after commercial operations begin, subject to verification.Total benefits cannot exceed 100% of eligible capital investment.
data.beneficiaries: All existing units who wants to setup Logistics Park project (Logistics facilities, Infrastructure facilities, Business & Commercial facilities) are eligible under this scheme.
data.prerequisites: Eligible Logistics Park project means those projects developed on atleast 25 acres of land in the State.EIP (Eligibility Investment Period) starts from the first investment date within the effective period and lasts up to 5 years or until commercial operations begin, whichever is earlier.Eligible Capital Investment refers to capital investment made during the eligible investment period. If investment starts before the effective date, at least 80% must be made after the effective date for it to be considered eligible for incentives.Reimbursements are provided after commercial operations begin, subject to verification.Total benefits cannot exceed 100% of eligible capital investment.
data.nodal_agency: Uttar Pradesh State Industrial Development Authority (UPSIDA)
data.context: Logistics is crucial in the global economy as it facilitates the exchange of goods and services for money through trade. This industry not only fosters economic growth but also addresses environmental and social concerns.
data.objective: The UP Government aims to enhance warehousing and logistics infrastructure, encourage private investment, create jobs, and adopt smart logistics methods through a new policy.
data.description: Scheme provides Back-end subsidies for Logistics park project:Capital Subsidy: 25% of eligible capital investment, with a maximum of Rs.2500 lakhs (Rs.5000 lakhsin Logistics Zones). Electricity Duty Exemption: 100% exemption for 10 years.Skill Development Subsidy: Rs.0.01 lakhs per trainee per month for up to 50 trainees for 6 months, for 5 years.Note: Total benefits cannot exceed 100% of eligible capital investment
data.how_to_apply: The applicant can register themselves to the given following link: https://niveshmitra.up.nic.in/Default.aspx
data.funding_facilitator: Uttar Pradesh State Industrial Development Authority (UPSIDA)
data.funding_mechanism: The applicant will get the incentives in following installments:75% of incentives: Paid in four instalments based on project spending.Next 10%: Paid after land is allotted to all units in the park.Final 15%: Paid after 80% of units start commercial operations.
data.checklist_info_a:
Project Proposal/Business Plan
Proof of Land Ownership or Lease Agreement
Company Registration Documents
PAN Card and GST Registration
Bank Guarantee (if required for exemptions)
Environmental Clearance (if applicable)
Affidavit or Undertaking for Project Commitment
Financial Statements (Balance Sheets, Profit & Loss)
Proof of Eligibility for Incentives (e.g., investment details)
Proof of Compliance with Local Authority Regulations
Approvals from Industrial/Development Authorities (if applicable)
